Package s3games.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardCanvas
    Implements the canvas that shows the game progress in game window
    CameraWindow
    A simple control window for letting the user control when to snap the current game state on the real board using the camera.
    Circular
    Represents a circular clicking area
    ControllerWindow
    Main control window of the application.
    ControlWindow
    A general control-panel window used both by camera and robot control panel
    GameWindow
    Implements the window that visualizes the game progress and detects user moves as mouse clicks
    ImageWithHotSpot
    Represents an Image and a relative-displacement of where it should be displayed in the board canvas
    LocationShape
    A general class for representing a place where location is sensitive to user mouse clicking.
    Rectangular
    Represents a rectangular clicking area
    RobotControlWindow
    An auxiliary window that is used to control the robot arm with the keyboard.
    RobotWindow
    A simple control window for letting the user control when to make a new move with the robot arm, and perhaps do some other operations on the robot
